title: Which are the most heart touching romantic songs according to lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well here goes my personal favourite Bollywood songs (according to lyrics): 1).Phir Mohabbat-Murder 2 2).Sanam Re-Sanam Re 3).Tere Liye-Sanam Re 4).Tum Hi Ho-Aashiqui 2 5).Banjaara-Ek Villain 6).Galiyaan-Ek Villain 7).Hamdard-Ek Villain 8).Mast Magan-2 States 9).Hamari Adhuri Kahani-Hamari Adhuri Kahani 10).Bol Do Na Zara-Azhar
